comments:
For some simple or specific extended items, they don't need custom IReportItemGeneration or IReportItemPresentation. In this case, engine should provide an implicit implementation to let it still work. This helps user to reduce the work needed for implement an extended item. Currently, NPE will be thrown out through engine processing.

This is specifically required for the RotatedText sample plugin, which doesn't need a custom IReportItemGeneration implementation at all.

If the user declares an empty extension in the plugin.xml, the ENGINE still throws out an NPE.
